message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm happy to start the price at $14,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product to me is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit shy of that number. Would you be willing to consider $9,500?
Bob, I appreciate your negotiation, but I need to be closer to my initial price.  Would you consider $11,000? This offer stands as a sign of good faith, hoping we can close this deal.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $11,000 is the right price for me. Would you be willing to consider $9,000?
